Algorithm:
def cocktailSort(arr):
    length = len(arr)
    counter = 0
    swap = True
    start = 0
    end = length-1
    while (swap == True):
        swap = False

        for i in range(start, end):
            counter += 1
            if (arr[i] > arr[i + 1]):
                counter += 1
                arr[i], arr[i + 1] = arr[i + 1], arr[i] # swapping the elements
                swap = True
        # checking if the array is sorted
        if (swap == False):
            break
        swap = False # not sorted

        end = end-1
        counter += 1
        for i in range(end-1, start-1, -1):
            if (arr[i] > arr[i + 1]):
                counter += 1
                arr[i], arr[i + 1] = arr[i + 1], arr[i] # swapping the elements
                swap = True
        start = start + 1
    return counter

def bubbleSort(arr):
    length = len(arr)
    counter = 0

    for i in range(length):
        for j in range(0, length-i-1):
            # now we will swap only if the current element is bigger than the next element
            counter += 1
            if arr[j] > arr[j+1]:
                arr[j], arr[j+1] = arr[j+1], arr[j] # swapping the elements
    return counter

def main():
    print('------ part A cocktail sort --------')
    arr1 = [8,3,6,9,1,1,5,7]
    arr2 = [5,4,2,8,7]
    arr3 = [1,8,6,2,7,3,5,7,9,8,5,3]
    
    cocktailSort(arr1)
    print(arr1)
    cocktailSort(arr2)
    print(arr2)
    cocktailSort(arr3)
    print(arr3)

    print('\n------ part A bubble sort --------')
    arr1 = [5,8,9,2,4,6,2,4,3,5,6,1]
    arr2 = [9,6,4,7,2,3,1]
    arr3 = [2,5,8,9,4,3,1,6,7]

    bubbleSort(arr1)
    print(arr1)
    bubbleSort(arr2)
    print(arr2)
    bubbleSort(arr3)
    print(arr3)

    print('\n------ part B --------')
    print("""
part B the calculate:
    bubble sort:
        [2,3,4,5,1] --> [2,3,4,1,5] --> [2,3,1,4,5] --> [2,1,3,4,5] --> [1,2,3,4,5] 
        4 in first arrow
        3 in second arrow
        2 in third arrow
        1 in last arrow
        so 10 in total
    cocktail sort:
        [2,3,4,5,1] --> [2,3,4,1,5] --> [1,2,3,4,5]
        4 in first arrow
        3 in second arrow
        2 in last arrow
        so 9 in total
""")
    print('\n------ part C --------')
    arr1C = [9,8,7,6,5]

    counter1 = cocktailSort(arr1C)
    print(arr1C)
    print("counter for cocktail sort = ", counter1)
    counter2 = bubbleSort(arr1C)
    print(arr1C)
    print("counter for bubble sort = ", counter2)

    print('\n------ part D --------')
    arr1D = [1,2,3,4,5]

    counter1 = cocktailSort(arr1D)
    print(arr1D)
    print("counter for cocktail sort = ", counter1)
    counter2 = bubbleSort(arr1D)
    print(arr1D)
    print("counter for bubble sort = ", counter2)

    print('\n------ part E --------')
    arr1E = [1,2,3,4,5]

    counter1 = cocktailSort(arr1E)
    print(arr1E)
    print("counter for coktail sort = ", counter1)
    counter2 = bubbleSort(arr1E)
    print(arr1E)
    print("counter for bubble sort = ", counter2)


if "__main__" == __name__:
    main()
